    dz_amazonia_guide.Rmd

    Useful Sources

    This document is written based on the following materials:

    • R Packages, Wickham, H. & Bryan, J. Available at - PCKG_R

    • Tidyverse Style Guide, Wickham, H. Available at - TIDY_STYLE

    • Grant McDermott’s Data Science for Economists Lecture Notes (PhD, University of Oregon). Available at - GRANT_DS_ECON

    • Advanced R, Wickham, H. Available at - ADV_R

    • R for Data Science, Tidyverse Team. Available at - R4DS
